Daft Zed?

Yes, yes, YES!
Man I just hope this becomes real and Zed's Recall is him breakdancing with a bunch of shadows around watching
I would spam recall more than with Neon Strike Vi.
I prefer this over DJ Sona
How about mix master Zedd? hehe
You sneaky you...

I like it, but here are my gripes:

It can't be a literal representation of Daft Punk, even if they're the source. Some adjustments to make it "Daft Punky" but not actually look like any of them would work.
The shadow should obviously look like a shadow, or rather a "clone". It eliminates his balance if all two shadows look like him with slight color differences. A few subtle strobe fx aren't enough. I'd suggest using his ultimate colorings for the actual clones. Those look cool.

This is just me but there should be come cool special fx during the time Nocturne uses his ult. AGAIN JUST ME XD

I think this is an amazing idea, and if you really want to push this, get the community to help with taunts and animation ideas. :D Sharing this on FB right now.

What if when mix master zed recalls a dj set comes up from the ground and he puts the discs from his back onto the turntables begins to play a song and every time he recalls its a different song? And he can do a little dance while jamming to the song. Sorta like primetime draven but much more flashier. :D
that item face is kinda creepy.....

<<BRING ME THAT SKIN>> -Michael Jackson 2008

OMFG I need this skin, and the best part if his ult and W have different colored clones it would make it easier for Zed players to keep track of which clone is which and it would make it easier for enemies to see the clones in fights making clarity not an issue at all. 10/10 would buy.
I think this is honestly one of the best skin ideas i've seen in a long time! Riot Please!

This. Is. Amazing.

I love zed, would buy this skin in an INSTANT.

Another awesomely cool effect would be if the shadows were just neon versions (like in the ultimate animation you have)

This would kill two birds with one stone, it would make the shadows easily distinguishable from the real zed, as well as make the skin even cooler! 

If each time you sent out a shadow it was a different random color (Pink, Green, Blue) it would be even cooooooler

I'm actually excited about this skin. I really hope riot sees it !

SIDENOTE: The neon shadows would make it much easier to play zed as well for me (as a zed player) seeing the shadows can get difficult, having a neon green thing chillen there would be helpful for the player as well as the enemy.
If its gonna be legendary or Ultimate priced go all out have them green when your close, then they change color with the arrow icon showing when you can jump back to them you know....

That's actually hilariously awesome.
I'd buy it
